1.brief: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)
properly, to score with a mark as a tally or record, i.e. (by implication) to inscribe, and also to enumerate; intensively, to recount, i.e. celebrate
properly, weight, but only figuratively in a good sense, splendor or copiousness
strength; as adjective, mighty; especially the Almighty (but used also of any deity)
an action (good or bad); generally, a transaction; abstractly, activity; by implication, a product (specifically, a poem) or (generally) property
a hand (the open one (indicating power, means, direction, etc.),

properly, to front, i.e. stand boldly out opposite; by implication (causatively), to manifest; figuratively, to announce (always by word of mouth to one present); specifically, to expose, predict, explain, praise
properly, an expanse, i.e. the firmament or (apparently) visible arch of the sky

2.brief: a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
a day (as the warm hours), whether literal (from sunrise to sunset, or from one sunset to the next), or figurative (a space of time defined by an associated term), (often used adverb)
to gush forth; figuratively, to utter (good or bad words); specifically, to emit (a foul odor)
properly, a twist (away of the light), i.e. night; figuratively, adversity
properly, a twist (away of the light), i.e. night; figuratively, adversity
properly, to live; by implication (intensively) to declare or show

3.brief: a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
a word; by implication, a matter (as spoken of) or thing; adverbially, a cause
properly, failure, i.e. nothing or destruction; usually (with preposition) without, not yet, because not, as long as, etc.
to hear intelligently (often with implication of attention, obedience, etc.; causatively, to tell, etc.)

4.brief: properly, the whole; hence, all, any or every (in the singular only, but often in a plural sense)
the earth (at large, or partitively a land)
to go (causatively, bring) out, in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively, direct and proxim.
a cord (as connecting), especially formeasuring; figuratively, a rule; also a rim, a musical string or accord
the earth (as moist and therefore inhabited); by extension, the globe; by implication, its inhabitants; specifically, a particular land, as Babylonia, Palestine
a word; collectively, a discourse; figuratively, a topic
the sun; by implication, the east; figuratively, a ray, i.e. (architectural) a notched battlement
to put (used in a great variety of applications, literal, figurative, inferentially, and elliptically)
a tent (as clearly conspicuous from a distance)

5.brief: he (she or it); only expressed when emphatic or without a verb; also (intensively) self, or (especially with the article) the same; sometimes (as demonstrative) this or that; occasionally (instead of copula) as or are
a relative by marriage (especially through the bride); figuratively, a circumcised child (as a species of religious espousal)
to go (causatively, bring) out, in a great variety of applications, literally and figuratively, direct and proxim.
to run (for whatever reason, especially to rush)
a well-trodden road (literally or figuratively); also a caravan

6.brief: the sky (as aloft; the dual perhaps alluding to the visible arch in which the clouds move, as well as to the higher ether where the celestial bodies revolve)

a going forth, i.e. (the act) an egress, or (the place) an exit; hence, a source or product; specifically, dawn, the rising of the sun (the East), exportation, utterance, a gate, a fountain, a mine, a meadow (as producing grass)
a revolution, i.e. (of the sun) course, (of time) lapse
above, over, upon, or against (yet always in this last relation with a downward aspect) in a great variety of applications
a non-entity; generally used as a negative particle
to hide (by covering), literally or figuratively

7.brief: a precept or statute, especially the Decalogue or Pentateuch
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
entire (literally, figuratively or morally); also (as noun) integrity, truth
to turn back (hence, away) transitively or intransitively, literally or figuratively (not necessarily with the idea of return to the starting point); generally to retreat; often adverbial, again
properly, a breathing creature, i.e. animal of (abstractly) vitality; used very widely in a literal, accommodated or figurative sense (bodily or mental)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
properly, to build up or support; to foster as a parent or nurse; figuratively to render (or be) firm or faithful, to trust or believe, to be permanent or quiet; morally to be true or certain;
to be wise (in mind, word or act)

8.brief: properly, appointed, i.e. a mandate (of God; plural only, collectively, for the Law)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
probably to brighten up, i.e. (figuratively) be (causatively, make) blithe or gleesome
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
a command, whether human or divine (collectively, the Law)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
to be (causative, make) luminous (literally and metaphorically)
an eye (literally or figuratively); by analogy, a fountain (as the eye of the landscape)

9.brief: fear (also used as infinitive); morally, reverence
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
pure (in a physical, chemical, ceremonial or moral sense)
to stand, in various relations (literal and figurative, intransitive and transitive)
properly, a (peremptory) terminus, i.e. (by implication) duration, in the sense of advance or perpetuity (substantially as a noun, either with or without a preposition)

properly, a verdict (favorable or unfavorable) pronounced judicially, especially a sentence or formal decree (human or (participant's) divine law, individual or collective), including the act, the place, the suit, the crime, and the penalty; abstractly, justice, including a participant's right or privilege (statutory or customary), or even a style
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
to be (causatively, make) right (in a moral or forensic sense)

10.brief: gold, figuratively, something gold-colored (i.e. yellow), as oil, a clear sky
abundant (in quantity, size, age, number, rank, quality)
honey (from its stickiness); by analogy, syrup
a dripping i.e. of honey (from the comb)

11.brief: properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and
to gleam; figuratively, to enlighten (by caution)
properly, to hedge about (as with thorns), i.e. guard; generally, to protect, attend to, etc.
a heel, i.e. (figuratively) the last of anything (used adverbially, for ever); also result, i.e. compensation; and so (adverb with preposition or relatively) on account of
abundant (in quantity, size, age, number, rank, quality)

12.brief: who? (occasionally, by a peculiar idiom, of things); also (indefinitely) whoever; often used in oblique construction with prefix or suffix
to separate mentally (or distinguish), i.e.(generally) understand
to hide (by covering), literally or figuratively
to be (or make) clean (literally or figuratively); by implication (in an adverse sense) to be bare, i.e. extirpated

13.brief: properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and
to restrain or (reflex.) refrain; by implication, to refuse, spare, preserve; to observe
not (the qualified negation, used as a deprecative); once (Job 24:25) as a noun, nothing
at that time or place; also as a conjunction, therefore
to complete, in a good or a bad sense, literal, or figurative, transitive or intransitive
to be (or make) clean (literally or figuratively); by implication (in an adverse sense) to be bare, i.e. extirpated
abundant (in quantity, size, age, number, rank, quality)

14.brief: to exist, i.e. be or become, come to pass (always emphatic, and not a mere copula or auxiliary)
the mouth (as the means of blowing), whether literal or figurative (particularly speech); specifically edge, portion or side; adverbially (with preposition) according to
a murmuring sound, i.e. a musical notation (probably similar to the modern affettuoso to indicate solemnity of movement); by implication, a machination
the heart; also used (figuratively) very widely for the feelings, the will and even the intellect; likewise for the centre of anything
the face (as the part that turns); used in a great variety of applications (literally and figuratively); also (with prepositional prefix) as a preposition (before, etc.)
Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
properly, a cliff (or sharp rock, as compressed); generally, a rock or boulder; figuratively, a refuge; also an edge (as precipitous)
to be the next of kin (and as such to buy back a relative's property, marry his widow, etc.)

Jehovah, Jewish national name of God
